storyInfo: Jesselton has been waiting in the morgue, where he takes Domma hostage, threatens Anthony, and demands Robin make a choice. Robin chooses Anthony.

attributes.content: Mighty big ruckus you've caused, Mr. Anthony.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Had I not known all about your plan in advance, I'm afraid not even I could've stopped you.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: You're Jesselton?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: That's right. I'm Jesselton.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: I'm sure you've noticed we've passed by each other in the prison a couple times, but allow me to introduce myself again.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: My name is Jesselton Miller, the very last obstacle to your prison break charade.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Where's Domma?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Right here.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Anthony, I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: I was waitin' here for you. I didn't expect this guy to barge into the clinic with the prisoners...
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: Domma...
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: This is such a gloomy place. It would be unbecoming of me to let a beautiful lady wait here all by herself.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: That's why I figured I'd offer her my protection.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Mr. Jesselton...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Oh, Ms. Robin, it looks like I was expecting a little too much from you. What a disappointment.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Or perhaps you never tried to kill him in the first place?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: She failed, and your lackeys couldn't hurt me.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Yet you spared her life. I must say, you are a fine gentleman, Mr. Anthony.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Save it.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Very well. Let us get straight to the point.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Mr. Anthony, if you don't want this young lady to die, please step over here.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Ms. Kafka, I would appreciate it if you would stay right there.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: I can tell you're the opportunistic kind. Please try not to do anything that would put Ms. Domma in harm's way.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Yes, just stand right there.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: All of you, surround him.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Anthony, don't listen to him!
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: It's okay, Domma. We are going to save you.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I have to hand it to you, Mr. Anthony. It's admirable that you are able to stay calm even in such a precarious situation.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: I'm sure you know what it is that I want, and you also know that I won't spare you out of compassion.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Here's my suggestion. Abandon the lady, abandon your affectations, and come fight me.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: You're wasting your breath.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I wonder how long you can keep this up.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: And you, Ms. Robin.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I would like you to kill Mr. Anthony. After all, you still have a job to do.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: It doesn't matter what kind of agreement you've made with Mr. Anthony or if you've had a change of heart, for whatever reason.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: If you want the money, and if you want to save your father, then this is your last, best hope.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Why the hesitation? Did Anthony promise you a blank check? Or have you grown soft on him after all this time?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Last chance, Ms. Robin.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Think of your father. Think of how your life is in tatters. Think of your future, your wish.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: If I were you, I wouldn't hesitate.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: What are you trying to do?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: What am I trying to do?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Isn't it obvious? If all I wanted was to kill you, I've had plenty of chances here.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: But that would be a li'l bit boring, wouldn't it?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: I've never found killing someone all that much fun, Mr. Anthony.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: But I really enjoy those moments when a person is faced with no choice but to abandon their past.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: That is why I lured Ms. Robin here. I long to see her change. I crave for her fall.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: And I thirst for your change as well. I thirst for the moment you finally lose your cool and bare your fangs, all for the sake of your family, your goals!
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: I mean it, Mr. Anthony. Take off your gentleman's facade.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Think of your family. Think of all you've been through, the humiliations you've faced. Think of the reason you're breaking out of this prison.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Do you really want to die here?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Do you really want to throw your life away for a woman you've only known a few years?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Stand up, Mr. Anthony. Push Ms. Robin aside, forget Ms. Domma, come at me and kill me!
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Not everyone out there is like you, Jesselton.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: You should know that you aren't all that special either, Anthony.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: I'll give you five seconds, Ms. Robin. If you don't act, I'll do it myself, and you'll die here with him.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Five.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Ms. Robin, you have yet to pay off your father's medical bills, and Mr. Anthony is penniless.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Anthony, I...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Four.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Mr. Anthony, your parents are having a miserable time in prison. They're being ostracized.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Father, mother...
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Three.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Anthony, don't worry about me! You can't die here!
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: Hmph!
attributes.name: Prisoner A

attributes.content: Gah...
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: Guess what, bitch? You ain't killing yourself on my watch.
attributes.name: Prisoner A

attributes.content: Ro...bin... don't...
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: Well, Ms. Domma is quite a bit more fiery than I expected. How admirable.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Alas, it didn't go as she planned.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Jes-sel-ton.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Now that's the face I want to see, Mr. Anthony. Wonderful.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: I'm curious. What is it that fuels your conviction?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Do you think your death can buy my sympathy for everyone else here?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Are your principles worth that much to you?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Perhaps you still have a card up your sleeve?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: I've done much to betray my principles in this prison.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I sweet-talked the jailers, stuck up for Barton, fought those I didn't want to fight, and lived a life I didn't want to live.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: This has nothing to do with principles.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: This only has to do with me.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I won't sacrifice Domma for my own ends. That's all there is to it.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Even though your family is still waiting for you?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: You have no right to talk about my family.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Even though you have revenge to take and questions you need answered?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: None of that is more important than the life of a friend.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Even if it ends up killing you?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Even if it ends up killing me.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Anthony...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: You have to think everything through and make your own choices. Then, you need to take responsibility for each of those choices.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Otherwise, you'll never be able to take your fate into your own hands.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: You must scrutinize yourself and think about what it is that you want to do.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Anthony...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: How regrettable.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Well then. Two.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.text: Robin finally takes a step forward.

attributes.content: One.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Ms. Robin, I understand your struggle, but you have a decision to make.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Anthony.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: No matter what you end up doing, don't regret your decision, Robin.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.text: She swings the knife in her hand.
Which then flies toward its target.

attributes.content: Gurghh!
attributes.name: Prisoner A

attributes.content: Anthony, leave Domma to me!
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Tsk! You prick!
attributes.name: Prisoner B

attributes.content: Heh, you two sure kept me waiting!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: When did you...?!
attributes.name: Prisoner B

attributes.content: ...Euggh...
attributes.name: Prisoner B

attributes.content: Anthony!
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: *Roars*!!!
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: So this is the trick you had up your sleeve.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: You knew Ms. Robin was on your side?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Perhaps your offer wasn't enticing enough.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Are you sure about this, Ms. Robin?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: From where I'm standing, you have chosen a path that has no future.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: It's true that if it wasn't for the Simons, my father wouldn't have turned out like that, but it's his fault for not getting back up on his feet.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I knew that. I just didn't want to accept it.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: And I... really don't want to do that either.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Anthony promised to come up with something to raise money for my father's medical bills.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: But that doesn't actually matter.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I've decided I'm not going to kill Anthony, and even if he doesn't help me, I'll come up with something else myself.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: And if my father dies before I get the money, then I...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Then I'll kill myself and apologize to him in hell.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: That's my decision.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Beautiful. Beautiful indeed.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: What a beautiful resolve, Ms. Robin.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: I suppose you've made your decision. You want to turn your back on our agreement because of that resolve.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Very well. Who am I to blame you for that? I should applaud you for making that decision, even.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: That said, I still have to point out one thing.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: When I said this path had no future, I didn't mean you won't have much of a future after your little jailbreak.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: I mean it all ends right here and now.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: There isn't a future where you make it out of this prison alive.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: I guess we'll have to see about that.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: No, no, no.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: I have to admit. You are very strong, Mr. Anthony.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: As for me, killing and violence aren't exactly my thing.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: That's why Ms. Domma was only the first step in my attempt to stop you from 'seeing about that'.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: As for the second step—
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Ugh... agh...
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Waagh!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Anthony, Kafka, are you two okay?
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: I'm... fine.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: You haven't forgotten the shackles on you, have you?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Dammit, this guy's thought everything through.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: I appreciate your compliment, Ms. Kafka.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: You asshole, you've been lying to Robin from the start!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: No, no, no. I just like to have more than one option.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Had Ms. Robin gone through with the deal and succeeded, it would've saved me quite a bit of trouble.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: And if she failed, as you can see, I've prepared a fall-back for her.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: You can't say I planned for all this without putting myself in her shoes.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Easy for you to say, but you dragged her into this mess.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Haha, I never denied I wanted to see her struggle, did I?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: However, Ms. Kafka, you are very much in the know yourself. Think about it. Do you think she could've raised enough money for her father's surgery, had I not dragged her into this mess?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: I think it's extraordinarily unlikely.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: See? You can't argue with me on that.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Hmph... I have to admit. She has a lot more to gain... by helping you out.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: But she didn't help you.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: And that's more than enough for me!
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: *Roars*!!!
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Still trying to fight despite the circumstances?
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Very well, then allow me to personally tear apart that last delusion.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: Anthony, I'll back you up!
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Tsk, I ain't quite as strong as Anthony, y'know...
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Huh... You guys watch out! His hand...
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: His hand turned black!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Ahh, how heartwarming.
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: To think I get to crush this emotional get-together...
attributes.name: Jesselton

attributes.content: It just fills me with delight, Anthony!
attributes.name: Jesselton
